Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avcodec.AVCodecContext.Rtp_callback_AVCodecContext_Pointer_int_int
    unused
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avformat.AVFormatContext.Open_cb_AVFormatContext_PointerPointer_BytePointer_int_AVIOInterruptCB_PointerPointer
    Use io_open and io_close.
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avcodec.AVPicture
    use AVFrame or imgutils functions instead
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avcodec.Cb_PointerPointer_int
    This function does nothing, and always returns 0. Be sure to build with thread support to get basic thread safety.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avutil.AV_PIX_FMT_FLAG_PSEUDOPAL
    This flag is deprecated, and will be removed. When it is removed, the extra palette allocation in AVFrame.data[1] is removed as well. Only actual paletted formats (as indicated by AV_PIX_FMT_FLAG_PAL) will have a palette. Starting with FFmpeg versions which have this flag deprecated, the extra "pseudo" palette is already ignored, and API users are not required to allocate a palette for AV_PIX_FMT_FLAG_PSEUDOPAL formats (it was required before the deprecation, though).
  • Deprecated Methods

    the old bitstream filtering API (using AVBitStreamFilterContext) is deprecated. Use av_bsf_free() from the new bitstream filtering API (using AVBSFContext).

    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avcodec.avcodec_copy_context(AVCodecContext, AVCodecContext)
    The semantics of this function are ill-defined and it should not be used. If you need to transfer the stream parameters from one codec context to another, use an intermediate AVCodecParameters instance and the avcodec_parameters_from_context() / avcodec_parameters_to_context() functions.
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.avcodec.avcodec_decode_audio4(AVCodecContext, AVFrame, int[], AVPacket)

    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avcodec.AVPacket.convergence_duration()
    Same as the duration field, but as int64_t. This was required for Matroska subtitles, whose duration values could overflow when the duration field was still an int.

    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.global.swscale.sws_subVec(SwsVector, SwsVector)
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avcodec.AVCodecContext.thread_safe_callbacks()
    the custom get_buffer2() callback should always be thread-safe. Thread-unsafe get_buffer2() implementations will be invalid starting with LIBAVCODEC_VERSION_MAJOR=60; in other words, libavcodec will behave as if this field was always set to 1. Callers that want to be forward compatible with future libavcodec versions should wrap access to this field in #if LIBAVCODEC_VERSION_MAJOR < 60
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avcodec.AVCodecContext.timecode_frame_start()
    use encoder private options instead
    org.bytedeco.ffmpeg.avcodec.AVCodecContext.vbv_delay()
    this value is now exported as a part of AV_PKT_DATA_CPB_PROPERTIES packet side data
